name: One Shot Bowling
description:
It came to me in a dream. A game different from the rest. Something you could only dream of. Something for people to believe in. Not just a game, but a piece of art. Not just something you play, something you feel. You don't just see it. You acknowledge. You don't just hear it. You listen.* They told me it couldn't be done. One Shot Bowling? They laughed. Impossible. How could one man pull off such a task? Yet, here I stand, alive. I didn't do it for the fame. I didn't do it for the money.** I just did it to fulfill a dream.

One Shot Bowling is a bowling game that takes place in some snow.

*One Shot Bowling does not actually have sound.

**One Shot Bowling is a free game.
